item.title: Trump Signals Imminent Lawsuit Against BBC Over Jan. 6 Reporting
item.description: President Donald Trump said Monday he plans to soon file a lawsuit against Britain's BBC over what he described as a misleading and damaging report ab...

item.title: RNC Research Targets Sen. Ossoff Over Shutdown Votes
item.description: Sen. Jon Ossoff, D-Ga., is "trying to gaslight his way out" of his shutdown votes, RNC Research wrote in a post on X.

item.title: Hunter Biden Disbarred in Conn. After Ethics Violations
item.description: A Connecticut judge disbarred Hunter Biden, son of former President Joe Biden, for violating the state's attorney conduct rules, after complaints tied...

item.title: Speaker Johnson: Turn to Scripture After Tragedies
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson, R-La., encouraged Americans to turn to Scripture and "appeal to our better angels" when horrific events occur.
